snippet: Cleveland receiver Josh Gordon, barred for violating the N.F.L.’s substance-abuse policy, has already served two league suspensions and will have to apply for reinstatement.
abstract: NFL suspends Cleveland Browns wide receiver Josh Gordon for at least one year without pay, citing violation of league's substance-abuse policy; Gordon failed test for alcohol after being on probation for drunken-driving arrest.
lead_paragraph: Cleveland receiver Josh Gordon, barred for violating the N.F.L.’s substance-abuse policy, has already served two league suspensions and will have to apply for reinstatement.

headline.main: Browns’ Gordon Is Suspended for a Year
headline.print_headline: Browns’ Gordon Suspended for a Year
